channel.title: Contribute on Project Flogo - Docs and Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Contribute on Project Flogo - Docs and Tutorials

item.title: Building the docs website
item.description: If you want to contribute to the documentation, that is awesome! Your help is very much appreciated, but please do keep in mind the instructions below. Prerequisites These documentation pages are built with Hugo and we do make some assumptions: You have Git 2.5 or greater installed on your machine. You have a GitHub account. Signing up for GitHub is free. You have Hugo installed on your machine. In Hugo, pages are the core of your site.

item.title: Contributing to the Showcase
item.description: Have an activity, trigger or app that you want to share with the Flogo comunity? That’s awesome! To contribute to the showcase follow the steps below. Folders The showcase is located at the root of the flogo repo and is structured as follows. showcases ├── data │ ├── items.toml <-- the showcase data file items.toml is the file that you’ll need to edit to add your activity, trigger or app.
